extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Simple Shoppings Lists App. In fact you can list anything you like using this app, for e.g Grocery ListsShopping ListsShort NotesFilm ListsTo-Do ListsGames ListsDIY Jobs ListBusiness IdeasApp IdeasAdd any type of Notes you need to list, but do not have a pen or paper to hand. You can even add your note by voice recognition (see screenshot - internet connection required)so it's even easier to add your note/items.After searching the App Store for a Shopping List App I couldn't help notice how complicated they were to use.Our Aim was to create a very basic App that would just list items easily, as well as edit items and delete items without any complications.I hope you agree this is easy to use and works pretty well.Happy Listing! Please Rate this Simple Lists & Notepad App for its ease of use to keep it Free. Thank You!

reviews.title: Simple shopping list
reviews.comment: I love this app it\'s easy to use and very simple. Great for those of us that are \"old schoolers\" attempting to understand this digital day.
reviews.author: Debbie Richardson

reviews.title: Simple n easy yo use
reviews.comment: Very simple and easy to use. Suits basic needs,  just like writing on notepad. Good job!
reviews.author: Jennifer Lim

reviews.title: Great list app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been trying to find a decent app to make short lists.  Not  a document program , just a scratch pad type app.  This one fills the bill for me perfectly
reviews.author: MaryAnn Hornbaker

reviews.title: At last. An Easy List App
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I have been looking for, a easy  app to list my to-do items, films to watch, and shopping list. Well done
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Very First Page is a coupon download notice...
reviews.comment: That pretty much says it all in terms of the direction this app is pushing you towards - to make $ for THEM.
reviews.author: R. Deegan

reviews.title: LOVE IT
reviews.comment: Be better if I could make different category like grocery, hardware an so on.  But for free this is PERFECT!-9
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Download now
reviews.comment: This app is a lifesaver saves me time in the market a two hour or more trip has me done and checked out in an hour or less I absolutely love this app a million thumbs up!!! :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple.
reviews.comment: Intro screen needs to go. I\'ve reviewed it already.
reviews.author: Peter Moskos

reviews.title: Simple list
reviews.comment: Very good need to drop the introduction page
reviews.author: John Eckard

reviews.title: Simply shopping list.
reviews.comment: I love the the fact that it\'s so simple to use.Thank You.
reviews.author: bettie hickman

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: All of my notes were deleted!!!! Any way to get them back. You should really have a\"are you sure you want to delete?\" In case you hit that button by mistake which is what must have happened to me!
reviews.author: liz mancuso

reviews.title: Easy to use
reviews.comment: This app does exactly what I need it to do in a straight forward manner that makes using it a pleasure. I realize there is a lot of competition to improve improve improve apps and widgets when the simplest program is more than appropriate. This app took 0 time to learn and I made use of it immediately!! Finally a simple idea backed by a simple app. I\'m in heaven and my lists have never been better.
reviews.author: Shereen Johnson

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: This app is great love how real easy and simple to use and to be able to delete things as you go.this is what a person needs if you need simple.
reviews.author: Pam B

reviews.title: Misled - only one list
reviews.comment: I was excited by the prospect of this app. The example is misleading, making one think there\'s an index of lists, then you add to individual lists. It didn\'t stipulate that there was only ONE LIST. It\'s okay, except for that, although I\'d like the list to be able to be in alphabetical order. Too simplistic. Misled, thus disappointed. Great potential if multiple lists could be stored & used. Maybe work on this.
reviews.author: Colleen Walker

reviews.title: Simple shopping list
reviews.comment: Its not 2 bad,u can make a list 4 that day or 4 a Tweek or 2 later
reviews.author: Anna Sola

reviews.title: Easy n straight forward
reviews.comment: This is a simple tool to memorize to dos. No alerts, no groups. Quick on the go notes, a simple aide memoir. Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.author: Susanne B.

reviews.title: Over all ok.
reviews.comment: I had a memo pad & list on galaxy 2 that I loved.  Can\'t locate the same ones but this works ok. Don\'t like I can\'t just click on the list without having to open everything first. Would like to have the individual list on my pages
reviews.author: Barbara Keltner

reviews.title: Song Writer
reviews.comment: Helps me write down songs to remember , I truly love it.
reviews.author: Shalon Kapayou

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Hate that screen  that pops up first and you have to wait on
reviews.author: A. L. PUTMAN

reviews.title: Easy listing.
reviews.comment: I just hope it has a check off feature.
